alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 10:48PM EDT until September 21 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...WESTERN WASHINGTON...OHIO AND BROOKE COUNTIES... At 1048 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Wheeling, Washington, Bethlehem, West Liberty, Triadelphia, Avella, Clearview, Valley Grove, Wolfdale, McGovern, East Washington, and Bethany. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
